Simple structure used by Scoped\-Callbacks to counter reference so that the last deference associated with a callback unregisters the callback.

\subsection{Detailed Description}
Simple structure used by Scoped\-Callbacks to counter reference so that the last deference associated with a callback unregisters the callback.
